author: k-gar
description: Boiler plate project for serverless applications.

scripts.dev:clean: echo 'ðŸ§¹ Cleaning up stale development processes...' && (pkill -f 'vite.*moto' 2>/dev/null || true) && (pkill -f 'tsx.*dev_server' 2>/dev/null || true) && echo 'âœ… Cleanup complete'
scripts.dev:check: echo 'ðŸ” Checking for port conflicts...' && (lsof -i :5173-5176,3001 2>/dev/null || echo 'âœ… No port conflicts detected')
scripts.dev:watch:packages: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --prefix-colors yellow,green,blue --names "TYPES,CORE,FRAMEWORK" "npm run dev:watch:types" "npm run dev:watch:core" "npm run dev:watch:framework"
scripts.dev: echo 'ðŸš€ Starting development servers...' && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --prefix-colors cyan,magenta --names "WEB,API" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:api"
scripts.dev:watch: echo 'ðŸš€ Starting development servers with file watching...' && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --prefix-colors cyan,magenta,yellow,green,blue --names "WEB,API,TYPES,CORE,FRAMEWORK" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:watch:types" "npm run dev:watch:core" "npm run dev:watch:framework"
scripts.dev:reset: npm run dev:clean && sleep 2 && npm run dev
